name: The Hidden Caverns of Nahala
description:
Best Mobile App Awards:
- Best Designed Mobile App (winner).
- Best Mobile Game of 2017 (nominee).

********************************************

Think you can solve the riddle quest of Nahala Order?
Play The Hidden Caverns of Nahala!

********************************************

After finding The Hidden Treasure of Nahala, your journey led you to this claustrophobic room. The door was closed behind you, leaving you in that dark underground maze.
A maze designed by the four knights of Nahala Order, inspired by the snake and the eagle, hiding the talisman and locking away any seeker.

Can you find the way out?

********************************************

"The Hidden Caverns of Nahala" includes:
- 3D animation
- Original soundtrack
- Puzzles and riddles to solve
- Mysterious environment
- and more...

Website: http://www.apealegames.com/
Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MExXwBw4QW8
